summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the east 64 feet of Lots 6 and 7, Block 1, Gibb's Addition, and the south 60 feet of Lot 7, Block 16, Highland Park Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-241 and 17-187, respectively.
